monologue.text: You enter the bar nervously, scanning the room for Guy.
The bar is bustling, and the energy of Open Mic Night is contagious, if not overwhelming.
*This isn't good, look at all these people...*
*I mean, look at that person with... what are those?! Wood swords? And irezumi tattoo!*
*If I slip up around that dude, it's curtains for me!*
Hey! Over here! There’s someone I’ve been wanting you to meet.
